alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 4:49AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Muscogee, western Talbot and Harris Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 449 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Fortson, or near Smiths, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Talbotton, Manchester, Waverly Hall, Woodland, Geneva, Upatoi, Shiloh, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, Flat Rock, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Cataula, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Baughville, Flint Hill, Olive Branch, Midland and Mountain Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
